review: Works great but don't see the need to have a prime membership to enjoy it if you already have  Netflix
author: Jake

review: It has been working great! No problems yet. Definitely recommend it!
author: Marilyn Cisneros

review: I have this upstairs and my Roku downstairs.  Both work great.BTW, I hardly watch Netflix anymore (which I can do directly through DISH now), because Amazon Prime offers so many more shows.
author: Lisa Ellen

review: Overall I like this, it's  more convenient than the box. The only thing I don't really like about it is that you still have to plug it in. I wish it was just a cordless usb stick. It works well, sometimes it pauses but customer service is fantastic and all you have to do is unplug it for a few minutes for it to go back to normal.
author: Sheena B

review: It runs kind of hot. Even the plastic case is melted and discolored. It works great, I am just concern about fire hazard.
author: M. Ch

review: Easy to install and easy to use!
author: Jetskier

review: I purchased this Fire TV Stick because i wanted to cut cost within my household and i am sure glad I did!!! Love Love Love this Fire TV stick!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Didn't work with my Home Theater System.
author: Eddy Rosell
